title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti until al dente.
Beat the eggs and mix with parmesan.
Combine spaghetti with bacon and egg mixture.
Season with black pepper and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala paste.
Cook onion and tomatoes into a sauce.
Combine chicken with sauce and simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or naan.
